## Types and Classes

### Types

```{r}
typeof(1.5)
typeof("toto")
typeof('between single quotes')
typeof(TRUE)
typeof(1L)
typeof(1)
typeof(typeof)
typeof(list())
```
### Classes

```{r}
data(iris)
typeof(iris)
class(iris)
```
